# DeviceActivityFilter.SegmentInterval

**Enumeration**

A type indicating the interval at which the system subdivides device activity data within a specified date interval.

## Declaration

```swift
enum SegmentInterval
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **DeviceActivityFilter.SegmentInterval.daily(during:)**: Indicates that the system aggregates data into daily segments within the specified interval.
- **DeviceActivityFilter.SegmentInterval.hourly(during:)**: Indicates that the system aggregates data into hourly segments within the specified interval.
- **DeviceActivityFilter.SegmentInterval.weekly(during:)**: Indicates that the system aggregates data into weekly segments within the specified interval.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable

items.description: Indicates that the system aggregates data into daily segments within the specified interval.
